Attagenus orientalis Reitter
in Schneider and Leder, 1878
Distribution in Iran : No locality cited (Zhantiev 1976; Tezcan et al. 2004; Háva 2007a, 2015a). Distribution outside Iran : Azerbaijan , Tunisia , Iraq , Lebanon , Syria , Turkey ( Háva 2015a ).
Distribution in Iran : Alborz (Farahbakhsh 1961), Tehran (Modarres Awal 1997), no locality cited (Zhantiev 1976; Abivardi 2001; Háva 2007a, 2015a).
Distribution outside Iran : Cosmopolitan species ( Háva 2015a ).
Hosts: Zoological collections, wool, cotton, silk, seeds, cereals, and related products (Farahbakhsh 1961; Modarres Awal 1997).

Comments:
Habrobracon stabilis (Wesmael 1838)
( Hymenoptera : Braconidae ) was reported as a parasitoid of
A. pellio
in Iran (Gadallah and Ghahari 2015).
